content.raw: Oh some of the documentation ended up going through without a fix...
content.html: Oh some of the documentation ended up going through without a fix...

update.description:
new features:

* setPermissionsRoutes (will make it easier to fix grant and revoke)
* save/load data (for not resources things)

refactor: the index.js cannot be required from other submodules (circular dependencies) so I started to split it up. Index was copied to grant.js, and routes.js was created. Functionality is unchanged.
update.title: Save pod refactor

content.raw: Are we sticking with `name` here? Not going to `id`?
content.html: Are we sticking with name here? Not going to id?

content.raw: The documentation looks specific to groups
So now we get the same information on `resource` and `id`. Is this so we can eventually remove `resource` and use `id` everywhere? Has it been added anywhere else in this PR?
content.html: So now we get the same information on resource and id. Is this so we can eventually remove resource and use id everywhere? Has it been added anywhere else in this PR?
